/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in shades of beige and brown, rise majestically, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, lined with trees that provide a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. Cars and buses move along the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting long shadows and bathing the entire scene in a warm glow.
